parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
Check for below Scenario from Application Data Capture
Scenario: Verify the Exclsuion Wordings is getting reflected or not if member having exclusion PED.
2) Product Name : Aarogya sanjeevani
3) Policy Plan :  Non Family Floater
4) Business Type : New Business
5) Members : 6A+2C= 8
6) Highest Highest Member Age Band  :  
Self : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED=Diabetes& Hypertension

mother in law : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,PED=Epilepsy

Take Decision for all member -> Accept with Exclusion
